name: kahe
description: Minimal frontend framework for managing transition flow between application states.
author: Nik Rowell <nik@nikrowell.com>

scripts.build: npm run bundle && uglifyjs kahe.js -mc --comments /^!/ > kahe.min.js && npm run size
scripts.test: budo test:bundle.js --live --dir test --title test -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --plugin tap-dev-tool
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run size && git add --all
